name: FNaF Multiplayer: Forgotten Pizzeria
summary: This is a free-to-play multiplayer game where the action takes place at night, in the insanely big, randomly generated Freddy Fazbear's Pizza. Players are randomly placed in one of the two available categories: nightguards and animatronics. Guards rush to find tools to complete maintenance work while the animatronics hunt them down with their special abilities.
